TEI.2.document_title: Stephen F Austin to Samuel M Williams, 08-28-1833

barker_notes.barker_summary: Austin to Samuel M. Williams, Mexico, August 28, 1838. "All is melancholy with death and civil war." Government hopes to dam Americans out of Texas by immigration of Poles and Germans—" as well try to dam the Mississippi with straw."

*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to Samuel M. Williams, Mexico, August 28, 1838. "All is melancholy with death and civil war." Government hopes to dam Americans out of Texas by immigration of Poles and Germans—" as well try to dam the Mississippi with straw."*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*[From Williams Papers, Rosenberg Library, Galveston, Tex.]*/p*
*p**location_mentioned*Mexico */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="08-23-1833">Augt. 28. 1833*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dr Sir.*/p*
*p*I fear that your detention in mobile will do some harm—you know that in *date_mentioned n="08-xx-1833">October */date_mentioned*the time expires for locating *location_mentioned*grants*/location_mentioned*—have all that attended to and take care not to forget*person_mentioned* Padilla*/person_mentioned*s. I have *location_mentioned*three leagues out of his*/location_mentioned* which I do not wish to loose—also attend to my title for the balance of my premium land.*/p*
*p*The cholera is abating but there has been no session of *person_mentioned*congress*/person_mentioned* since the *date_mentioned n="08-14-1833">14 */date_mentioned*and it is expected there will [be] no business done until *date_mentioned n="09-xx-1833">next month*/date_mentioned*. It is said that upwards of 16.000 have died.*/p*
*p*The revolution is not yet ended. *person_mentioned*Arista */person_mentioned*has possession of *location_mentioned*Guanajuato */location_mentioned*and there are a variety of reports about the progress of the *person_mentioned*Crusade party*/person_mentioned*, but I do not think they can succeed. The civil war may probably be protracted sometime.*/p*
*p*I can say nothing definite as to *location_mentioned*Texas */location_mentioned*matters—they are all before *person_mentioned*congress */person_mentioned*but when there will be a session I know not—neither is there any certainty at all, what *person_mentioned*congress */person_mentioned*will do as to *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned*. I have strong doubts on the subject.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Tadeo Ortiz*/person_mentioned* has been sent to the *location_mentioned*U. S.*/location_mentioned* by *person_mentioned*Government */person_mentioned*on some misterious mission, but what it is I cannot tell—some say it is to take *person_mentioned*Poles*/person_mentioned*, or *person_mentioned*Germans */person_mentioned*or somebody else to *location_mentioned*Texas */location_mentioned*to dam out the *person_mentioned*north americans*/person_mentioned*—stop the *location_mentioned*mississippi river*/location_mentioned* with a dam of straw—he told me he would be in *location_mentioned*Texas */location_mentioned*in *date_mentioned n="11-xx-1833">Novr*/date_mentioned*. and I think he is friendly to the people there and liberal in his ideas etc nothing of much interest has transpired since my last—all is suspended by the cholera—all is melancholy with death and civil war. I am better but debilitated*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*S.F.A*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Do not neglect the tract that *person_mentioned*Brown */person_mentioned*surveyed *location_mentioned*east of colorado foot of mountains*/location_mentioned*—one of *person_mentioned*H. Austin*/person_mentioned*s is not yet located. Close all up as fast as possible—no one can tell what is ahead.*/p*
*/div1*
